entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 22. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon with 40 percent chance of showers later this afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm this afternoon. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 this afternoon. High 22. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PDT Tuesday 03 May 2016
